fr.cnes.doi.settings

Class EmailSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnes.doi.settings.EmailSettings

  • @Requirement(reqId="DOI_CONFIG_010",
             reqName="Configuration du serveur central")
public final class EmailSettings
extends Object
    Singleton to load and use Email settings.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert

        receiverEmail - receiver
        Returns:

      • sendMail

        private boolean sendMail(org.restlet.data.Protocol protocol,
                         org.restlet.Request request,
                         boolean startTls,
                         String subject,
                         String msg,
                         String to)
                  throws Exception
        Sends an email only when "Starter.CONTEXT_MODE" is set to PROD.
        Parameters:
        protocol - Protocol (SMTP or SMTPS)
        request - request
        startTls - startTls
        subject - Email's subject
        msg - Email's message
        to - receiver
        Returns:
        True when the message is sent
        Throws:
        Exception - - if an error happens when stopping the request
